text: Lorenz-Günther Köstner (born 30 January 1952) is a retired German footballer who is now a football manager who last managed Fortuna Düsseldorf. Following the sacking of Armin Veh on 25 January 2010, he was named interim manager of VfL Wolfsburg until 30 June 2010. == Managerial statistics == Team From To Record G W D L Win % Bayern Hof 1 July 1982 15 February 1986 Reutlingen 05 1 October 1986 30 June 1989 SC Freiburg 1 July 1989 31 August 1989 Hessen Kassel 15 September 1989 30 June 1990 Stuttgarter Kickers 1 July 1993 1 March 1994 SpVgg Unterhaching 1 July 1994 1 October 1997 1\.
